SHUTTLE SERVICE (Hotel ↔ Camp Humphreys / 30min, 21km)

"It's free only on weekdays for guests"
You must make a reservation before you can use it.

● Hotel → Camp humprey : Departure time : 07:30 a.m → Arrival Time : 08:05 a.m ● Camp humpreys → Hotel : Departure time : 17:30 p.m → Arrival Time : 18:05 a.m

Note 1. You must make a reservation before you can use it. 2. our hotel shuttle service only offers humpreys. 3. in the case except number 1 and 2. should use taxi.

TIME & DISTANCE K55

Our hotel ↔ Osan Air Base(K55) / 25min, 22km

SHUTTLE SERVICE

“ It is a shuttle bus that runs within the Osan Air Base.”
Osan Shuttle Bus Schedule (Monday ~ Friday)

● Morning Shuttle : 05:00 a.m ~ 08:26 a.m ● Evening Shuttle : 15:00 p.m ~ 18:30 p.m

Note. Click here to bus schedule.
